body.name: Steve Madden Designer 20 Inch Luggage Collection - Lightweight Softside Expandable Suitcase for Men & Women - Durable Carry On Bag with 4-Rolling Spinner Wheels (Legends Turquoise)

features: ✈️ LIGHTWEIGHT AND EXPANDABLE; The expandable luggage provide lots of packing area for your personal belongings; Helps you adhere to airline weight restrictions and avoid unneeded airport fees which make it best suitcase for domestic and international travel

✈️ BUILT FOR COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE; You can easily drag along the airport with its ergonomic handle providing easy maneuverability and relieve any pressure from your arms while on the move; The 4-spinner wheels system allow smooth, 360° degree movement over any rough terrain for complete mobility free-weight rolling

✈️ DELICATE DESIGN; The stylish unique style, noble and elegant design, catering to the new trend of fashion. No matter travelling on the weekends or go abroad, you will be the distinctive one. Suitcase lining made of high quality and safe polyester fabric; PERFECT GIFTS; Beloved, friends, parents, Christmas, saint valentine, birthday, anniversary, mother's day, new year, Thanksgiving etc

✈️ HI-STABILITY: Wide wheel positioning provides better balance and resistance from falling forward/ unique base structure - specially developed case platform provides additional strength and stability; CASE DIMENSIONS (with wheels and handles): 21.5 X 14 X 9 inch - (without wheels and handle) : 20 x 14 x 8 inch , WEIGHT 7.8 lbs
✈️ SATISFACTION GUARANTEED; Limited 5 year manufacturer warranty plus trusted companion promise, which covers the cost of repair for damage for any manufacturer defect or replace the defective bag
body.description: Make the most out of your next trip with our top-rated suitcases🌟 Steve Madden SoftSide Carry On Luggage Collection delivers great durability together with a fashionable design. It is made from polyester fabric to provide your belongs with maximized protection. 🌟 Steve Madden suitcase has convenient storage to carry the most of what you need. 🌟 Carrying around a full suitcase is a whole lot easier with Spinner Wheels. 🌟 You can literally turn on a dime and let your suitcase glide effortlessly. 🌟 The use of 360 degree spinner wheels and telescopic push button handle system enables high stability over a variety of surfaces especially crowded airport. 🌟 The suitcase has been extensively tested to fit the overhead cabin requirements for most airlines🌟 The dimensions of the suitcase with wheels and handle: 21.5 X 14.2 X 10.2 inch 🌟 The dimensions of the suitcase without wheels and handle: 20 X 14 X 8 inch 🌟 The storage capacity is approximately 36 L not expanded. An additional 4 liters is available by expanding the suitcase.🌟 The weight of the luggage is approximately 7.8 lbs🌟 This luggage is covered by a limited 5 year manufacturer’s warranty.🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Anything Steve Madden that I have purchased is terrific. This luggage does not disappoint. Fits in overhead of plane, fine. Wheels turn nicely. It's a sharp looking piece of luggage too. Recommend. I have no more information to provide. Buy it. Like it. If not, return it. Simple. Easy. Done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great carry-on bag!
reviews.reviewText: As of lately I have been very big on getting all my travel items to match. I originally ordered the the grey and tan version of this suitcase (for purpose of not having a black luggage bag like most) however I felt the grey to look a bit greenish and was not pleased with the color so I had returned it for this black/tan version. I love this suitcase! It is esthetically very pleasing. I attached a small lanyard to the side for a subtle identification that it is MY bag when out in public) and it matches the new carrier for my pup. I really do love the different pockets inside the bag which allows me to organize my items I travel with. I use the front large bottom pocket to carry my 13" macbook pro (and sometimes ipad mini) for easy access when getting through TSA. Overall the bag has been excellent! The only concern is how long the pull out handle will last along and the 4 wheels (the handle doesn't feel too sturdy, especially when having my dog carrier on top of the bag). When having my dog carrier on top I will roll the bag by holding it with two hands and do my best to not apply to much pressure to only the handle when pushing.. this is also my first 4 wheeler bag and I have not always heard the best about 4 wheelers lasting long. However, I do not plan to check this bag ever so I'm hoping within my care I can keep it to last relatively well. Very happy with my purchase so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This suitcase is not only attractive, but it has various pockets, and can expand to increase packing space. Rolling it is a breeze. I love the color, style and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece of luggage. It does have a faint pattern that isn't described or shown in the pics.
reviews.reviewText: Totally love it! The size, the quality, the whole kit and kaboodle. It does have an odd chemical type of smell, so I'm airing it out. It's brand new with tags. The other thing is the fabric pattern does not show up in the pics like it does in person. There is a stripe in the pattern that you can't see. It looks online as if there is some shading with the color, but that shading is actually printed on the fabric. I've taken pics so you can see. It's still a nice piece of luggage, and I am quite pleased.UPDATE after a 4 day trip and using it on the airlines: Still love the color and the ability to pack in clothes. If it's packed too much, though, it likely will have to be checked or valeted because it's too deep ("fat") to make it in the airline baggage size checker. I had to valet it on the smaller flights. I love the way it rolls - it's not cumbersome, and it doesn't try to fall over like one of my other bags that I just threw off the balcony because I hated it so much LOL. The frosted pocket that snaps inside - FAIL - what a disappointment - the snap came off the first time, and I used extreme caution so it wouldn't break. It fell right off on the table. Knocking it down a star because of that. But, it is a nice looking and very useful bag that you can spot a mile away, so I'm still happy with it. I just know now how to pack it properly for airlines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart looking and ideal for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I loved it so such I bought all 3 pieces. I receive compliments on them when I travel. I use the carry on and under seat for domestic travel. My last purchase was the larger one. I bought it for over seas travel. I’ll let you know how it holds up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great carryon bag! compact, light, strong and easy to maneuver
reviews.reviewText: I liked how easy it was to move around, the wheels move in all directions so it was great getting down the aisle in the plane. It is also small enough to fit easily in the compartment.Great price also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, holds a lot , can be heavy!
reviews.reviewText: Love this! Looks great and so different from most luggage when I travel! It holds a lot and can get heavy! If you extent it it might not fit in most over head airplanes. I had a hard time getting it into an AA plane over head because of the weight I put in it, they will do the valet check on the small planes which is nice. It rolls on all 4 wheels and has a lot of packet space. Wish I had the under the seat to go with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately I don’t have enough time to return this carry on bag or to get a replacement. The color is lovely, the overall look of the bag is exactly what I was hoping for, it looks like it has plenty of space for a multi day trip, however, there was a huge tear in the stitching on the side. Not really sure what happened, I was able to repair it somewhat by hand stitching it, which luckily I know how to do, so I could use it for my trip but am not thrilled to have spent this much to have a damaged product arrive that needed fixing and I don’t have any other feasible options to use this short notice.Hopefully the rest of the bag holds up okay with actual use. :/ it’s also missing the locking mechanism for the zippers. Overall I like the bag but am questioning how durable it will actually be in the long run.
